name: Verification Scoreboard
body:
### Some notes about the Verification Scoreboard.
This project is under development, and public content is limited. Team members will be able to participate more fully in this project beginning in late August 2016.

### Authors and Contributors
At the moment Jeff Norville (@jeffnorville) is the main contributor, with support from others.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
